overview_of_class: Multimedia Journalism is a general introduction to visual and multimedia journalism and storytelling techniques. Students will learn the theories behind and fundamentals of photo and video journalism in order to create their own compelling audio slideshows and video news packages; in addition, students will gain a deeper understanding of how to use social media and search engine optimization techniques to extend the reach of their reporting.
name: Multimedia Storytelling
title: DOHA JOUR 203-0-70 Multimedia Storytelling
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for Journalism majors sophomores, only who have passed JOUR 201 with a C- or better.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Multimedia Journalism is a general introduction to visual and multimedia journalism and storytelling techniques. Students will learn the theories behind and fundamentals of photo and video journalism in order to create their own compelling audio slideshows and video news packages; in addition, students will gain a deeper understanding of how to use social media and search engine optimization techniques to extend the reach of their reporting.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: JOUR 201-0 with C- or better

  • Open to sophomores Journalism majors

subject: JOUR
